alert.note: Alert for Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 9:25PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Allen, northeastern Grant, Blackford, southeastern Huntington, Adams, Wells, northwestern Jay and southwestern Van Wert Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 923 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms extending from about 8 miles southwest of Bluffton indiana into Williams Ohio, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bluffton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 near mile marker 6, and between mile markers 9 and 14. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 261 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
